abstracts.cdata!:
To finance the import of fertilizer
            during FY81 ($49.9 M), and to provide consultants'
            services ($0.1 M) to review management and organization of
            the major public sector fertilizer producers with the view
            to improve production capacity utilization. Fertilizer
            imports would be administered by the Ministry of Food,
            Agriculture and Cooperatives. The consultants' services
            would be administered by the National Fertilizer Corporation
            of Pakistan.
